short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a SAP Note number from a web page, right click, and open the note directly in the web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- A small extension to provide a right-click's context menu for opening a SAP Note.
- Option to switch to Fiori UI.
